text: Ato ni inokotta sabaku no Arabu hito-tachi wa, anata ni mukatte,`watashi-tachi wa, zaisan ya kazoku no koto ni torawarete imashita.Dakara dō ka watashi-tachi no tame ni, yurushi o inotte kudasai.' To kare-ra wa, kokoro ni mo nai koto o shita no saki de iu. Itte yaru ga ī. `Moshimo arrā ga anata gata o gaishiyou to o nozomi ni nari, matawa eki shiyou to o nozomi ni nareba, dare ga anata gata no tame ni sukoshidemo arrā no i o hirugaesu koto nado dekiyou ka.' Iya, arrā wa, anata gata no okonau koto o shiri tsukusa reru
